items.name: The Artisan's Canvas
items.short_description: A vibrant hub showcasing contemporary Nigerian art, featuring rotating exhibitions, workshops, and a chic cafe. Discover emerging talents and established masters in a modern setting.
items.address: 15 Ngwa Road, GRA Phase 2, Port Harcourt

items.name: Skyline Oasis Lounge
items.short_description: Experience breathtaking panoramic views of Port Harcourt while enjoying craft cocktails, gourmet bites, and live music. Perfect for a sophisticated evening out with friends or colleagues.
items.address: Top Floor, Titanium Towers, Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Rivers FunZone Arcade
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art family entertainment center offering arcade games, virtual reality experiences, laser tag, and a soft play area for younger kids. Endless fun for all ages!
items.address: Trans-Amadi Road, Opposite Shell R.A., Port Harcourt

items.name: Mangrove Heritage Park
items.short_description: A newly developed urban eco-park dedicated to preserving Port Harcourt's unique mangrove ecosystems. Features boardwalks, birdwatching towers, and educational exhibits for nature lovers.
items.address: Off Peter Odili Road, Elelenwo, Port Harcourt

items.name: Grand Galleria Port Harcourt
items.short_description: Port Harcourt's newest premium shopping destination, featuring international brands, local boutiques, a multi-screen cinema, and a diverse food court. A complete lifestyle experience.
items.address: Plot 18, Nzimiro Street, Amadi-Ama, Port Harcourt

items.name: Adrenaline Bay Extreme Park
items.short_description: Get your heart racing at Port Harcourt's first dedicated extreme sports park, offering thrilling rock climbing walls, zip-lining, challenging obstacle courses, and an ATV track.

items.name: The Flavor District PHC
items.short_description: A vibrant culinary destination showcasing the best of Nigerian and international cuisine. Features gourmet food stalls, pop-up restaurants, and live cooking demonstrations in a lively atmosphere.
items.address: Sani Abacha Road, GRA Phase 3, Port Harcourt

items.name: The Oasis Retreat & Spa
items.short_description: A luxurious boutique hotel with public access to its stunning infinity pool, world-class spa facilities, and an exquisite restaurant. Perfect for a day of relaxation and pampering.

items.name: ConnectSphere Innovation Hub
items.short_description: More than just a co-working space, this dynamic hub hosts regular public workshops, tech meetups, and entrepreneurial pitching events. A magnet for creatives and innovators in the city.

items.name: Rivers Vista Promenade
items.short_description: A beautifully landscaped waterfront promenade along the Bonny River, offering scenic walks, cycling paths, outdoor fitness zones, and casual eateries. A refreshing urban escape.
items.address: Near Creek Road Market, Port Harcourt (redeveloped area)
